item.title: Ice Skating is Melting Ice and Forming A Stream of Water Beads
item.description: Ice Skating is Melting Ice and Forming A Stream of Water Beads Ice scates are concave with an edge on each side.

item.title: Can We Throw Satellites to Space? - SpinLaunch - YouTube
item.description: Can We Throw Satellites to Space? - SpinLaunch - YouTube See [[Centrifugual Force]] and [[Catapult]] Uses [[Carbon Fiber]] to swing projectile in loop in [[Vacuum]], then releasing it Launch at high velocity Has been done before with large guns, but loop allows scaling up for larger projectiles [[Turbo Pumps]] Like a [[Venus Fly Trap]], rotating many disks at high speed that let air out but not in https://youtube.
